summary: "TAKATA RECALL" I PURCHASED A 2013 FORD EXPLORER AND THE WINDSHIELD PILLAR HAS COMPLETELY FLOWN OFF WHILE GOING DOWN THE ROAD , I HAD THE DRIVERS SIDE FIXED AND 2 DAYS LATER THE PASSENGERS SIDE FLEW OFF. THANKS GOODNESS THIS DID NOT CAUSE A WRECK. THIS SHOULD BE A RECALL I HAVE SEEN LOTS OF COMPLAINTS ON THIS, AND IT COST AROUND 400 TO FIX. ATTACHED IS A PICTURE OF ONE SIDE BEFORE IT FLEW OFF
